org.treetank.page.interfaces

Interface IReferencePage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IndirectPage, RevisionRootPage, UberPage

    public interface IReferencePage
extends IPage
    Interface denoting all pages holding references to other pages. The references are represented by the keys of the serialized storage.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int GUARANTEED_INDIRECT_OFFSET
      Guaranteed Indirect Offset from any ReferencePage.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long[] getReferenceKeys()
      Getting the keys of the referenced pages.
      void setReferenceKey(int pIndex, long pKey)
      Setting one key of a page to be referenced from this page.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.treetank.page.interfaces.IPage

        getPageKey, serialize

    • Field Detail

      • GUARANTEED_INDIRECT_OFFSET

        static final int GUARANTEED_INDIRECT_OFFSET
        Guaranteed Indirect Offset from any ReferencePage.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getReferenceKeys

        long[] getReferenceKeys()
        Getting the keys of the referenced pages.
        Returns:
        the keys for the referenced pages.

      • setReferenceKey

        void setReferenceKey(int pIndex,
                   long pKey)
        Setting one key of a page to be referenced from this page.
        Parameters:
        pIndex - offset of the key to be referenced
        pKey - the key of the page to be referenced
